description.lang: SW-ESW01N is an electrical power measuring device, which is compatible with Z-Wave enabled devices with its embedded radio frequency (RF) technology. It can also be used with other devices with the Z-Wave logo regardless of the manufacturer.Furthermore, SW-ESW01N can act as a signal repeater that will extend the wireless transmission range and increase the reliability of your network. With a Z-Wave compatible gateway and software program, youll be able to monitor and inform the energy usage of the connected appliance.
Support grouping identifier = 1 Support one group with 5 nodes. All triggering report will be sent to the associated nodes.
Relay state when power up0 : Last relay state (default setting)1 : Relay on2 : Relay off
Auto report relay state0 : Disable1 : Enable (default setting)
